column5: Anybody been enjoying the series "Sonic Highways" by the Foo Fighters?   It's been on HBO, been really enjoying it myself.  Dave Grohl is so good!!  Just a heads up if nobody has heard of it!!
They're doing a marathon tonight if anyone is interested
Well as long as they're fighting Foo, that's all that matters anyhow

Have not missed one, he is one talented man. My lady loves it too. I love he is doing what he does and I can't wait to see what city and musicians he will visit next. If anyone likes an eclectic mix of genres you have to catch it. New Orleans and seeing the old bars still open was fantastic. Then again the Seattle episode was great. The desert episode was different, not my favorite.
Awesome series! I like all the different people he gets on the show as well
If i had a chance to hang out with one celeb..........Dave grohl would be in my top 5  I dont have HBO, so unfortunately havent seen the series
